Reference

All functions

calculate_astcat()

Calculate Aspartate Aminotransferase Category

calculate_bmi()

Calculate Body Mass Index

calculate_bsa()

Calculate Body Surface Area

calculate_crcl()

Calculate Creatinine Clearance

calculate_crcl_peck()

Calculate Creatinine Clearance using the Peck Formula

calculate_egfr()

Calculate Estimated Glomerular Filtration Rate (eGFR)

calculate_egfr_child()

Calculate Estimated Glomerular Filtration Rate for Children using the Schwartz Formula

calculate_ibw()

Calculate Ideal Body Weight

calculate_ibw_child()

Calculate Ideal Body Weight for Children

calculate_lbm()

Calculate Lean Body Mass

calculate_nciliv()

Calculate NCI Liver Function Group

calculate_rfcat()

Calculate Renal Function Category

calculate_tbilcat()

Calculate Total Bilirubin Category

Count observations and unique values by group

Count search results
